page.title: 13Social Survey of Basing
page.content: We conducted a{survey}to find out about the life of the people of Basing. We found that most people{work}in Basingstoke. Most people used a{car}to get to work but some people had already{retired.}Some people said they didn't want Basingstoke too near Basing,but others said it was handy for{shopping. About 37% of the inhabitants of Basing are retired.The others mainly work in Basingstoke. People like the village because it is quiet and picturesque.It also has its own{shops. People do not like fast{traffic}going along the Basing roads. Some people feel that Basing will be swallowed up into the town. The people are proud of{Basing House {which is a{tourist attraction.
